dialog.text: Hello. The seeker  feels hopeless, but he can promise to go.
Oh, hi, how are you doing?
I feel emotionally sad. The seeker  feels anxious and worried about losing his job. The supporter could tell the seeker the need to keep the same skills but also how to do it better.
Oh, I'm so sorry to hear that. I hope I could help you. Why are you feeling emotionally sad?

My boyfriend broke up with me about several months ago. And he didn't even say goodbye face to face. I just don't know why.. The seeker  feels happy and happy. He would like to be able to say goodbye to his boyfriend.
Oh, that's so hard. Good relationships are so hard to come by and lose. Do you think you'll get back together with him?
beam_texts: Oh, that's so hard. Good relationships are so hard to come by and lose. Do you think you'll get back together with him?

dialog.text: I don't know. I haven't even thought about that yet. I just need to find someone else I guess.. The seeker  feels
I think that would be a good idea. You don't want to be with someone who doesn't want to be with you.
beam_texts: I think that would be a good idea. You don't want to be with someone who doesn't want to be with you.

dialog.text: That's true. I just miss being in a relationship. The seeker  feels worried about losing his job and does not want to see his job taken away. The supporter could tell the seeker the the situation is not comfortable for him. He should wait for the seeker to tell him what he wants at his next meeting.
I understand that. It can be hard to find a new job when you lose your current one.
beam_texts: I understand that. It can be hard to find a new job when you lose your current one.

dialog.text: That's true. I didn't think about that. The seeker  thinks the situation is right.
I understand that you must feel betrayed as well since the person you thought was your true love is seeing other people.
beam_texts: I understand that you must feel betrayed as well since the person you thought was your true love is seeing other people.

dialog.text: I do. He told me he didn't want a relationship but I thought we were doing well and we have a lot in common. The seeker  feels depressed and worried about being in a relationship. To keep this positive attitude, the support should be a bit
That does sound like we have a lot in common.
beam_texts: That does sound like we have a lot in common.

dialog.text: We do. Do you think I should call him? The seeker  does not think about the person he met over the phone. He says that he loves them and they are not friends.
I think that would be a good idea.
beam_texts: I think that would be a good idea.

dialog.text: Okay. I'll do that after this conversation. The seeker  is worried about his job and the loss of his job. The supporter could discuss how he feels about it with the seeker.
I think it would help to talk to him about how you are feeling.
beam_texts: I think it would help to talk to him about how you are feeling.

dialog.text: I think you're right. The seeker  feels optimistic. The supporter could tell the seeker that there are people around him to make him feel happy.
I hope it all works out for you.
beam_texts: I hope it all works out for you.

dialog.text: Thank you. The seeker  can read through the following message to help him understand how he feels.
You're welcome.

Have a good day. The seeker  is worried about how he is going to be able to make amends for his past events. He is also curious about his relationship with his girlfriend and how he would feel if he were alone.
You too.
I think we have to make a few more comments to finish the task. The seeker  feels emotional depressed. The seeker should feel happy and comfortable.
Yes, of course.

Yes, of course.
